title.rendered: Welcome to an Exclusive Android App Development Company in the USA

content.rendered:
At AppSquadz, Android App Development is our innate gift as we have been crafting mobile applications for Android for years. At present, we are among the leading Android app development companies in the USA, with more than 350 Android applications to our name and a long list of happy clients including Fiat, ICICI, Coca-Cola, Taxi for Sure, Apollo etc.

Our dedicated android application developers have helped many businesses achieve competitive mobile edge, a better reach to their customers and enhanced ROI.

Why Choose AppSquadz for Hiring Android App Developers in the USA

  • Proven authority in customer acquisition and engagement
  • Innovative approach and results driven engineering approach
  • We understand time is money and thus always deliver the result on or before time.
  • Excellent marketing strategy
  • 24/7 customer support

We always endeavor for a distinctive approach to any Android application development project. We understand the fact that developing a great mobile app is not sufficient in today’s time. The application result should also be apt for preferred market success and end-user engagement. And this is why our squad of dedicated Android developers tries to not only understand your app idea from the technology viewpoint but also dig deep to comprehend the strategy behind it to develop the precise road-map to render an appealing Android app. As an Android app development company, AppSquadz Technologies provides end-to-end services to assist you at every cycle of your mobility project, right from strategy, execution to support.

Android Game Development in the USA

Android is without a doubt world’s most well-liked platform for millions of Smartphones, tablets and other gadgets. More than 80 percent of the smart devices are powered by android only. In fact, a great majority of revenue on Google Play comes from games.

We understand this fact and thus are boasting a great talent of android game developers in our AppSquadz Family. We have an incredible experience in developing android games using latest tools and technologies such as Android SDK, Android widget SDK, Open GL, and Unity 3D. We craft games that are engaging and appealing to end users.

Android App UI/UX Development in the USA

We are extremely competent in Android UI/UX development in the USA. Our main emphasis is on user’s experience while interrelating with front-end and back-ends of the system. We have proficient Android UI/UX designers who assemble your details and design as per your preferences. Our UI/UX designers have a remarkable perception of user-centered design principles, brilliant visual design expertise, and technical know-how.

Get your android app development needs fulfilled with our unbeatable squad and unbelievable results.
